name: TheBarryTown
description:
A grim tower defense type of game aimed to mobile, about a common village trying to stand up against the odds and defend their homeland from horrors of the low-fantasy world.

The game is still pretty bugged but core gameplay is finished :)

Controlls: left mouse button click or hold for 2 seconds on a unit to open it's information window.

Unfortunately when uploaded to itch.io as HTML playable in browser the game has no audio which is why I provide you with working downloadable zip
